We Dare You to Find a More Active Club!​
Your premier destination for signature events, fun outings, and lively themes, Vineyards Country Club hosts more than 800 annual experiences. Vineyards Country Club hosts a variety of signature annual events, family activities, on-campus events, off-campus excursions and interclub programming and year-round opportunities to experience the best that Southwest Florida has to offer.

Its calendar of upcoming events provides the perfect way to connect and experience all that Southwest Florida has to offer!

Belong to a True Legacy at Vineyards Country Club
YOUR DESTINATION OF CHOICE FOR WELLNESS, LIFESTYLE AND HOSPITALITY
Founded in 1988, Vineyards Country Club is a private, family-owned, nonequity club in breathtaking Naples, Florida. This landmark destination offers a rich history and longstanding reputation for integrity, exceptional service and compassion.
One of the largest country clubs in Naples, Vineyards has earned numerous awards and accolades for its dedication to delivering an unmatched, timeless experience for golf, wellness, fine dining, social events and more. Both residents and non-residents are welcome to enjoy the club’s resort-style amenities. This includes two award-winning, 18-hole
championship golf courses
set against 300-acres of verdant greens.
Laying the Foundation
for a True Legacy
Vineyards Country Club began as the dream of two brothers and successful businessmen, Joseph and Michael Procacci. After growing their family’s tomato business into one of the largest wholesale produce distributors in the world, the Procacci brothers founded the Vineyards Development Corporation with the vision of creating a community of lasting integrity in North Naples. As a result, the country club provided buyers with greater value from the start. More than three decades later, Vineyards Country Club remains debt-free, competitive and stable, offering a sustainable legacy that many local clubs simply cannot match.
BECOME A MEMBER
AT VINEYARDS COUNTRY CLUB!
EXPLORE MEMBERSHIP
Vineyards Country Club Awards & Accolades
As a debt-free club,
members
do not pay assessments. The strong ownership of the Procacci family has ensured that Vineyards Country Club will maintain its legacy of stability and luxury for generations to come.
Creating a community of lasting integrity inspired Vineyard’s creators to invest heavily in the community’s central feature, its award-winning country club. Vineyards Development Corp. broke ground on the country club in October 1986, with its completion in January 1988. One of the largest country clubs in Naples, more than 300 acres were dedicated to the club’s grounds and its clubhouse is a spacious 70,000 square feet.
To keep the club fresh and competitive at the highest level, Vineyards Country Club has continued to expand and enhance its facilities over the years. Since its original construction, the club has completed three renovations. During its 30th year, the clubhouse received a total renovation and brand-new 15,000 square-foot state-of-the-art Wellness Center & Spa, delivering exceptional amenities and service to Vineyards members and their guests.

What People Say About Vineyards Country Club
This place is gorgeous! What a beautiful remodel here at the club. We just went to Italian night, perfectly prepared shells, pasta bar, salmon, grilled veg., and the best service.
- Deb M.
‘Membership in the Vineyards Country Club is like being on a Cruise Ship. There’s a choice of dining options from, fine dining to informal Dining and a Pub with an impressive menu and many craft beers, as well as pool-side casual dining. There is an Activities Director with similar responsibilities to a Cruise Director and there are always a wide variety of exciting activities. Two tournament quality golf courses, twelve tennis courts and three Bocce courts are just some of the sports activities and the Fitness Center is one of the finest available anywhere. In the unlikely event there is an activity you're interested in that isn't scheduled, it will be if there are a few others who share your interest.’
- William S.
‘Vineyards is a high-class country club with two beautiful golf courses’
- Barry B.
My wife and I played The Vineyards last week, it was AWESOME. Everyone from the bag drop area, the pro shop, bar,  restaurant and the cart girl. The course was in great condition. The workers on the course would stop, turn down their machines while you played your shot. This is the place to go join if you want to be a member of a beautiful Country Club it has everything. You need to check this club out before you join anywhere. This was the highlight of our stay in Naples.
- Perry K.
The new Wellness Center & spa is state-of-the-art. It’s large and it’s personal at the same time. The staff make you always feel welcome. I’m a tennis player, and the tennis staff at the club are professional personable and simply the best. There’s a common thread throughout this club, quality, value and always creating a positive member experience.
- Mark M.
Their tennis pro shop has a great selection of tennis/pickleball items. The new pickleball courts are great. The club personnel are very informative and nice.
- Joanne D.
400 Vineyards Blvd., Naples, FL 34119
(239) 353-1500

Discover an Idyllic Corporate Event Venue in Beautiful Naples, Florida
Vineyards Country Club Provides a Variety of Spaces for Corporate Gatherings
Are you in search of the perfect venue to host your next corporate event? Imagine a place where elegance meets professionalism, surrounded by stunning landscapes.
Whether you’re planning a high-stakes meeting, a team-building retreat, or a lavish gala, Vineyard Country Club is designed to meet your every need. With a variety of stunning spaces that cater to both intimate gatherings and large-scale events, Vineyards Country Club is the ultimate destination for unforgettable corporate gatherings.
Schedule Your Event
What You Can Expect from Our Corporate Event Venues
When you choose Vineyards Country Club as your corporate event venue, you can expect a sophisticated and picturesque setting that enhances any business gathering.
State-of-the-art audiovisual facilities ensure your presentations are seamless and professional, while dedicated event coordinators are on hand to assist with every detail, from catering to décor. The tranquil environment coupled with exceptional service creates an inviting atmosphere for networking and collaboration.
Schedule Your Event
Considering a Golf Outing?
Named
“Best Golf Course to do Business,”
hosting a corporate golf outing at Vineyards Country Club offers businesses a unique opportunity to blend networking with recreation in a serene and sophisticated environment. Nestled amidst picturesque landscapes, the club features a world-class golf course that provides an ideal setting for team building and client engagement. Attendees can enjoy a day of golfing while forging stronger relationships, strengthening team dynamics, and creating memorable experiences away from the office.
Corporate Golf Events
Frequently Asked Questions
These FAQs are aimed to help businesses answer questions they have about hosting a corporate event at Vineyards Country Club.
What types of corporate events can be hosted at Vineyards Country Club?
At Vineyards Country Club, we can accommodate a variety of corporate events, including corporate retreats, meetings, conferences, seminars, team-building events, and corporate celebrations. Our versatile spaces can be tailored to meet your specific needs.
What audio-visual equipment is available for corporate events?
We provide a range of audio-visual equipment to enhance your corporate event experience. This includes projectors, screens, microphones, sound systems, and Wi-Fi access. Our team can help set up the necessary equipment to ensure your presentation runs smoothly.
Are catering services available for events?
Absolutely! Vineyards Country Club offers exceptional catering services featuring a variety of menu options to suit your preferences. Whether you’re looking for breakfast, lunch, dinner, or cocktail receptions, our culinary team will work with you to create a customized menu that meets your needs.
How far in advance should I book my corporate event?
We recommend booking your event at least three to six months in advance to secure your preferred date and venue space, especially during peak times. However, we can accommodate shorter notice requests based on availability.
What is the cancellation policy for corporate events?
We understand that plans can change, and we offer a flexible cancellation policy. The specific terms will be detailed in your contract, but generally, cancellations made within a certain timeframe may incur fees. Please consult our event coordinator for full details.
For additional questions or to schedule a tour of our facilities, please contact the Vineyards Country Club event team.
Vineyards Country Club Can Host Your Next Corporate Event
Vineyards Country Club offers an exceptional venue for your next corporate event, combining elegance with a tranquil setting that enhances productivity and engagement. With versatile event spaces that can accommodate small meetings to large conferences, the club is equipped with state-of-the-art audiovisual technology and personalized catering options to ensure a seamless experience.
Whether you’re looking to host a team-building retreat, a client appreciation event, or a formal gala, Vineyards Country Club is dedicated to delivering excellence and making your event a success.
Schedule Your Event
.entry-content .clear
#post-##

Host Your Corporate Golf Event at Vineyards Country Club!
Vineyards was Named “Best Golf Course to do Business” by the “Best of Business” Poll
Corporate events often serve as key opportunities for relationship-building and team bonding, but finding the right venue that combines professionalism with leisure can be a challenge. Vineyards Country Club, named the “
Best Golf Course to do Business
” offers the perfect blend of luxury, beautiful scenery, and exceptional service, making it a premier destination for hosting memorable corporate golf outings.
SCHEDULE YOUR EVENT
What You Can Expect
One of the key attractions of Vineyards Country Club is its breathtaking natural beauty. The club boasts meticulously manicured landscapes, lush fairways, and scenic water features that provide a picturesque backdrop for any corporate event. The following features elevate Vineyards Country Club from other corporate golf settings:
Corporate Tournaments
Sponsorship Opportunities
Extensive Food and Beverage Options
Event Coordination
On-Course Assistance
Team Building Opportunities
Expansive Double-Wide Fairways
Pro Shop & Facilities
SCHEDULE AN EVENT
FAQs:
Corporate Golf Events
This FAQ section aims to guide you through a corporate golf event on our pristine course at Vineyards Country Club.
What types of corporate golf events can be hosted at Vineyards Country Club?
Vineyards Country Club accommodates various types of corporate golf events, including tournaments, networking outings, charity events, team-building activities, and client appreciation days. Our flexible event packages can be tailored to meet your specific needs.
How many guests can participate in a corporate golf event?
Our golf course can accommodate events for groups of any size. We can host intimate gatherings for as few as 20 participants up to larger tournaments with over 100 players. Please contact our events team to discuss your specific requirements.
What amenities are available for corporate events?
Vineyards Country Club offers a range of amenities, including a fully equipped pro shop, golf cart rentals, practice facilities, and on-site dining options. We also provide meeting spaces for presentations or gatherings, AV equipment, and catering services to enhance your event experience.
What is the process for reserving a date for our corporate golf event?
To reserve a date, simply contact our events team via email or telephone. We recommend booking as early as possible to secure your preferred date and time, especially during peak seasons. Upon confirming your event, we will guide you through the next steps and assist with all planning details.
What is the cancellation policy for corporate events?
Our cancellation policy varies based on the specifics of your event. Typically, cancellations made within a certain time frame prior to the event may incur fees. We advise reviewing our terms and conditions for complete details or discussing with our events team.
Trust Vineyards to Make Your Golf Event a Memorable One!
Hosting a corporate golf event at Vineyards Country Club promises an unforgettable experience characterized by upscale amenities, a stunning setting, and exceptional service. Whether you aim to reward employees, connect with clients, or enhance team dynamics, the club offers an unparalleled venue tailored to meet your corporate needs. Embrace the opportunity to blend business with pleasure in an environment that inspires collaboration and fosters lasting connections.
SCHEDULE YOUR EVENT

An Elegant Event Venue in Naples, Florida
Trust Vineyards Country Club to Host Your 
Special Event!
Host your unforgettable celebrations/events at Vineyards Country Club. For events large or small, our dedicated staff meticulously handles every detail to ensure a seamless, relaxed and carefree experience for you and your guests. With a range of stunning indoor and outdoor venue options, you’ll find the perfect space to exceed all your expectations, create lasting memories and make your event truly unforgettable.
While membership is not required to host a private event at the Vineyards clubhouse, every guest can expect a high level of quality, attentive service, sophisticated style and exceptional cuisine, delivered at an excellent value. Vineyards Country Club values your trust and will always make your special day our top priority.
BOOK YOUR SPECIAL EVENT TODAY!
An Elegant Event Venue in Naples, Florida
Trust Vineyards Country Club to Host Your 
Special Event!
Host your unforgettable celebrations/events at Vineyards Country Club. For events large or small, our dedicated staff meticulously handles every detail to ensure a seamless, relaxed and carefree experience for you and your guests. With a range of stunning indoor and outdoor venue options, you’ll find the perfect space to exceed all your expectations, create lasting memories and make your event truly unforgettable.
While membership is not required to host a private event at the Vineyards clubhouse, every guest can expect a high level of quality, attentive service, sophisticated style and exceptional cuisine, delivered at an excellent value. Vineyards Country Club values your trust and will always make your special day our top priority.
BOOK YOUR SPECIAL EVENT TODAY!
Indoor and Outdoor Event Venues
Our versatile indoor and outdoor event venues are designed to create an unforgettable experience for you and your guests.
Bridal Suite
From elegant decor to top-of-the-line amenities, our bridal suites provide an indulgent and romantic experience.
Indoor Event
If you’re looking for an elegant event venue for your special day, our indoor venue delivers a spacious and refined ambiance.
Outdoor Event
Our outdoor event space embodies the luxurious coastal feel of Naples, Florida. Bask in this premier country club setting for your special day.
Reception Room
From stunning decor, elegant furnishings, and impeccable service, a luxurious reception venue sets the stage for a truly memorable occasion.
BOOK YOUR SPECIAL EVENT TODAY!

Book Your Events Venue at Vineyards Country Club
REGISTER NOW TO RECEIVE A COMPLIMENTARY CATERING GUIDE
Planning a special event can be a daunting task, especially when it comes to arranging the catering. The food and drinks served at an event can make or break the overall experience for guests, so it’s important to get it right. That’s where the Vineyards Country Club catering guide can be incredibly beneficial. By providing valuable information and tips on selecting the perfect menu, accommodating dietary restrictions, and working within budget constraints, a catering guide can help ensure that your event is a success.
BOOK YOUR SPECIAL EVENT TODAY!
A Distinguished Party Venue for Small Gatherings
When it comes to hosting a small gathering or party, choosing the right venue can make all the difference. Instead of opting for a traditional restaurant or event space, consider the luxury and elegance of Vineyards Country Club. With picturesque surroundings, top-notch amenities, and impeccable service, a country club provides the perfect backdrop for an intimate celebration with friends and family. 

The club’s Lobby Bar offers a welcoming, comfortable space that can serve you and your guests with ease. Its gracious accommodations extend outside to a covered veranda with scenic views of Vineyards’ two renowned golf courses.
BOOK YOUR SPECIAL EVENT TODAY!
What Our Clients Say
Add Arrows
4.7
264 Google Reviews
We had our daughter's Sweet 16 at The Vineyards Country Club and it was AMAZING! The food was out of this world, not only delicious, but plated so beautifully you could honestly eat it with your eyes. The service was fantastic, and everything went so smoothly. A big shoutout to Demi Munar and her team! Demi was there the entire time, super responsive, and made sure every detail was perfect. .entry-header
A Luxurious and Relaxing Country Club Experience in Naples, Florida
Vineyards Country Club delivers pristine amenities and unmatched hospitality
Located in spectacular Naples, Florida, Vineyards Country Club is one of this city’s most unique and remarkable places. We serve as a home away from home for those seeking authentic connections in an environment of unsurpassed reputation and quality. Our door is always open to those who appreciate the best of everything and want to belong to a true legacy!
Our country club experience will help you discover everything the wonderful city of Naples has to offer, all in a club setting.
JOIN THE CLUB
Country Club Amenities
Vineyards Country Club offers an unparalleled lifestyle experience for those seeking the ultimate in leisure and refinement. With world-class amenities and a breathtaking natural setting, Vineyards provide a sanctuary of relaxation and recreation for our discerning members.
From championship golf courses and state-of-the-art fitness centers to elegant dining establishments and lavish spa facilities, the amenities we offer are designed to cater to every whim and desire. Join us and explore the luxurious amenities at Vineyards Country Club.
COUNTRY CLUB EXPERIENCE
Private Golf Courses
Full Golf Memberships are open to both residents and non-residents of the Vineyards community. Explore 36 holes of one of the finest private golf courses in the golf capital of the world, Naples. Daily accessible tee times are available for members with a 4- hour pace of play average per 18 holes.
GOLF
Weddings and Other Special Events
The ultimate event destination in the heart of Naples, Florida, Vineyards Country Club provides an elegant setting to create lifelong memories with loved ones, friends, and guests. A newly renovated ballroom, grand dining room, and banquet rooms provide the perfect setting to host weddings, reunions, bat mitzvahs, quinceañeras, award galas, corporate meetings, and more.
BOOK AN EVENT
Wellness Center & Spa
Located just moments from the clubhouse, a 15,000-square-foot Wellness Center and Spa offers a variety of resort-style amenities and services to promote overall wellbeing and social connection. Recently designated one of America’s Healthiest Clubs, the serene space provides central access to a top-of-the-line fitness center, five-star salon and spa, aquatic exercise, and a charming café for healthy dining.
WELLNESS CENTER & SPA
Distinguished Dining Experience
When it comes to dining in style, few experiences can rival the elegance and sophistication of country club dining at Vineyards. From the exquisite decor to the impeccable service, the Vineyards Country Club experience is truly a feast for all the senses. Join us for both upscale and casual dining.
DINING
Country Club Activities and Events
Are you ready to live life to the fullest in a tropical paradise? Vineyards Country Club provides activities for socializing and developing lasting relationships. We’re known for our tight-knit community where members can forge life-long friendships and business connections. By engaging in group activities, you have the chance to meet like-minded individuals with similar interests which can open doors to new opportunities.
ACTIVITIES & EVENTS

An Elegant Event Venue in Naples, Florida
Trust Vineyards Country Club to Host Your 
Special Event!
Host your unforgettable celebrations/events at Vineyards Country Club. For events large or small, our dedicated staff meticulously handles every detail to ensure a seamless, relaxed and carefree experience for you and your guests. With a range of stunning indoor and outdoor venue options, you’ll find the perfect space to exceed all your expectations, create lasting memories and make your event truly unforgettable.
While membership is not required to host a private event at the Vineyards clubhouse, every guest can expect a high level of quality, attentive service, sophisticated style and exceptional cuisine, delivered at an excellent value. Vineyards Country Club values your trust and will always make your special day our top priority.
BOOK YOUR SPECIAL EVENT TODAY!
An Elegant Event Venue in Naples, Florida
Trust Vineyards Country Club to Host Your 
Special Event!
Host your unforgettable celebrations/events at Vineyards Country Club. For events large or small, our dedicated staff meticulously handles every detail to ensure a seamless, relaxed and carefree experience for you and your guests. With a range of stunning indoor and outdoor venue options, you’ll find the perfect space to exceed all your expectations, create lasting memories and make your event truly unforgettable.
While membership is not required to host a private event at the Vineyards clubhouse, every guest can expect a high level of quality, attentive service, sophisticated style and exceptional cuisine, delivered at an excellent value. Vineyards Country Club values your trust and will always make your special day our top priority.
BOOK YOUR SPECIAL EVENT TODAY!
Indoor and Outdoor Event Venues
Our versatile indoor and outdoor event venues are designed to create an unforgettable experience for you and your guests.
Bridal Suite
From elegant decor to top-of-the-line amenities, our bridal suites provide an indulgent and romantic experience.
Indoor Event
If you’re looking for an elegant event venue for your special day, our indoor venue delivers a spacious and refined ambiance.
Outdoor Event
Our outdoor event space embodies the luxurious coastal feel of Naples, Florida. Bask in this premier country club setting for your special day.
Reception Room
From stunning decor, elegant furnishings, and impeccable service, a luxurious reception venue sets the stage for a truly memorable occasion.
BOOK YOUR SPECIAL EVENT TODAY!
Bridal Suite
From elegant decor to top-of-the-line amenities, our bridal suites provide an indulgent and romantic experience.
Indoor Event

Outdoor Event

Reception Room

Book Your Events Venue at Vineyards Country Club
REGISTER NOW TO RECEIVE A COMPLIMENTARY CATERING GUIDE
Planning a special event can be a daunting task, especially when it comes to arranging the catering. The food and drinks served at an event can make or break the overall experience for guests, so it’s important to get it right. That’s where the Vineyards Country Club catering guide can be incredibly beneficial. By providing valuable information and tips on selecting the perfect menu, accommodating dietary restrictions, and working within budget constraints, a catering guide can help ensure that your event is a success.
BOOK YOUR SPECIAL EVENT TODAY!
A Distinguished Party Venue for Small Gatherings
When it comes to hosting a small gathering or party, choosing the right venue can make all the difference. Instead of opting for a traditional restaurant or event space, consider the luxury and elegance of Vineyards Country Club. With picturesque surroundings, top-notch amenities, and impeccable service, a country club provides the perfect backdrop for an intimate celebration with friends and family. 

The club’s Lobby Bar offers a welcoming, comfortable space that can serve you and your guests with ease. Its gracious accommodations extend outside to a covered veranda with scenic views of Vineyards’ two renowned golf courses.
BOOK YOUR SPECIAL EVENT TODAY!
